results.content:
This is was a short and sweet course, really appropriate for me as I had very limited time. Very much practical and straight into code.

A couple of additions which could have been an icing on the cake:
1. an example with authentication using IAM
2. lamda to update the DynamoDB, rather than manually updating it
3. HTTPS

results.content: No sample code provided.  Instructor does undocumented changes in class making it impossible to repro or follow along.  Instructor does not respond to questions.  Current AWS does not work as shown in the course.  It does provide a walk through of some areas of AWS.

results.content: Very good intro to serverless word. I learned a lot from this course. Because serverless is new, I wonder what kind of pitfalls we might end up with when we go production?
results.content_html: Very good intro to serverless word. I learned a lot from this course. Because serverless is new, I wonder what kind of pitfalls we might end up with when we go production?

results.content:
I learned a lot from this course. The instructor is straight to the point and goes through a very practical code-along, which in my opinion is the best approach for Udemy lessons.  The hands on code along was excellent.  I little bit more discussion around the API Gateway would be helpful. It seemed like the API Gateway module was cut a bit short without much explanations, and discussions around the handler options. 

Overall, excellent course. Keep up the great work with the excellent code along samples.
results.content_html:

results.content:
Easy pace.  Great real world example.
Would have loved to see taking this example and making it production ready, fine tuned.

Would have loved to see a fully exposed REST api with standard http conventions defined.  Did not see the 400/500 http status codes in API gateway shown but they were coded.

Would have liked to see more detail into step functions.
results.content_html:
Easy pace. Great real world example.
Would have loved to see taking this example and making it production ready, fine tuned.

Would have loved to see a fully exposed REST api with standard http conventions defined. Did not see the 400/500 http status codes in API gateway shown but they were coded.

Would have liked to see more detail into step functions.

results.content: This course was a good quick hands-on experience on AWS serverless technologies. This course os for those who already know AWS serverless technologies such as Lambda and DynamoDB and also node.js. If you do not understand these technologies, I recommend to spend some time to get yourself familiar with these things and then do this course for a hands-on real world application implementation of these technologies. Overall great course, to the point. The instructor however completely missed a section on how to create DynamoDB streams and jumped right on to the yaml configuration of it, it looks like some part of the video was just cut in that chapter. Other than that, great course!
